verses.roman:
pūrve yena kṛṣṇa yadi parihāsa kaila
śuni' rukmiṇīra mane trāsa upajila

synonyms: pūrve—previously; yena—as; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; yadi—when; parihāsa kaila—play a joke; śuni'-hearing; rukmiṇīra mane—in the mind of Rukmiṇīdevī; trāsa—fear; upajila—arose.
translation: Previously, in kṛṣṇa-līlā, when Lord Kṛṣṇa wanted to joke with Rukmiṇīdevī, she took His words seriously, and fear awoke within her mind.
